name: PetIQ, Inc.
description: PetIQ, Inc. is a leading provider of pet medications and health products aimed at improving the lives of pets and their owners. Founded in 2010, the company is dedicated to making pet healthcare accessible and affordable by offering a wide range of products through both retail and veterinary channels. PetIQ specializes in prescription and over-the-counter medications, as well as preventative care solutions, including flea and tick treatments, heartworm prevention, and wellness supplements. The company operates a state-of-the-art manufacturing facility that adheres to stringent quality standards, ensuring the safety and efficacy of its products. PetIQ continues to innovate in the pet healthcare space, leveraging advanced technology and research to develop new offerings that meet the evolving needs of pets. Furthermore, PetIQ aims to educate pet owners about the importance of preventive healthcare, helping to create a healthier and happier life for pets. With a commitment to quality and customer service, PetIQ is becoming a trusted name in the pet healthcare industry, striving to enhance the well-being of pets across the nation.

seo.meta_title: PetIQ, Inc. | Affordable Pet Medications and Health Products
seo.meta_description: Explore PetIQ, Inc., your trusted provider of affordable pet medications and health products. Discover our range of offerings for your pet's health and wellness.

faq.question: What does PetIQ specialize in?
faq.answer: PetIQ specializes in pet medications and health products, including flea and tick treatments, heartworm prevention, and wellness supplements.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of PetIQ?
faq.answer: The CEO position is currently vacant.

faq.question: Where is PetIQ headquartered?
faq.answer: PetIQ is headquartered in Eagle, Idaho, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does PetIQ offer?
faq.answer: PetIQ offers a variety of products including pet medications, flea and tick treatments, heartworm prevention, and wellness supplements.
